text: Laurence Robert Harvey (born 17 July 1970) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Martin Lomax in the horror movie The Human Centipede 2 (Full Sequence) and as Dwight in The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence). ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:English movie actors Category:People from Wigan
title: Laurence R. Harvey
